content: all free for you to get do not sell this design you may make this pattern for own use do not sell this shawl for own profit if it s for sharity contact me exceptions can be made please do share your creations with me i d love to see it tag me on insta or fb edit edit in pdf row 18 there was a 4 missin at the start for chain 4 row 42 50 and 58 is not treble_crochet in chain space but double_crochet sorry for the faults they still lingered in there from the first pattern design the new pdf is now uploaded with the faults corrected
